page.title: 17HOME LIFE-RECREATION
page.content:
MY MUM...well my Mum used to knit but she gave it up because she said it was an awful bore. She always likes to see people occupied, not just sitting there doing nothing. She likes listening to music played on the Radio or on her Cassette Player. She also likes to watch television-she enjoys watching soap operas. She reads and smokes. I would like her to give that up.
MY DAD...well my Dad likes to make his own Beer and Wine. He is very good at making Beer and Wines(Carrot Wine and Elderberry Wine). He too like to watch some soap operas on television and read Library Books. He is good at cooking and he wants me to be a Chef when I grow up.
